sense.name: the process
sense.commentary: The act of growing, evolving, building, improvement, developing...
sense.examples: The development of the plan took only ten years. The development of an embryo is a complicated process. The Research and Development team has the results. If development of your pictures takes more than one hour - it's free

sense.name: the end product
sense.commentary: The result of growing, evolving, building, improvement...

sense.name: the act of developing
sense.commentary: Used to reference the happening of a recent event.
sense.examples: In light of recent developments we will reexamine our decision. We can watch the latest developments unfold on the news tonight.
